lead_paragraph: KEAN--Hamilton F. It is with great sadness that the Board and staff of The New York Botanical Garden offer their condolences to Edith Kean, a dear friend and dedicated member of the Botanical Garden's Board of Trustees, on the passing of her husband, Hamilton. Edie and Ham have long championed the Garden's work, particularly its community gardening outreach program, Bronx Green-Up. We extend our deepest sympathies to Edie and the other members of Ham's family. Maureen K. Chilton, Chairman Gregory Long, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KEAN, HAMILTON F
